title: Responsive Teaching Workshop for Chemistry Education: Enhancing Pre-Service Teacher Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Non-degree programs for in-service teachers to enhance professional competencies, with a digital device-enabled environment

learning_goals: Construction of a framework for systematically analyzing learners' pre-existing concepts (evaporation/boiling).
Application of three or more responsive teaching strategies that connect learners' misconceptions to academic concepts.
Conducting practical exercises to observe and provide feedback on learners' cognitive change processes in online environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
